input.sentences: she was going to be his bride for life
friends and family were there for support

output.sentences: Mom and Dad are so happy to see their little girl all grown up.
It's a perfect wedding day, the photographer is taking memorable pictures.
The wedding party looks great, glad their friends got to be part of the special day!
Both of the groom and bride grandparents were able to attend, how awesome is that?
A day that will long be remembered!
